name: 東江
message: "The Celebration will continue for two days, with the main event taking place tomorrow. I promise it will make today's festivities pale in comparison."

name: 東江
message: "But before tomorrow arrives, I would like to give you all a taste of happiness unlike any you've ever experienced. ...If you please."
Toue beckons to the man behind him.

name: 東江
message: "This is Sei. He's like a son to me. I wouldn't be the man I am today if not for him."

name: 東江
message: "This Celebration is also my way of introducing him to you."

name: 東江
message: "He gives me hope. He is an emissary of joy. So I ask you to welcome him, and give him your blessing."
A murmur ripples through the crowd as they turn their eyes on the young man named Sei.
The cameras, too, focus on him. Slowly, he lifts his face.
That's the guy I saw in the alley!
Like last time, electricity shoots through my body.
But this time, I can't tear my eyes away.
Those eyes, blinking inside my skull...
He's inside me...
Staring deep...
...deep...
A sharp pain in my skull snaps me out of it. It feels like waking from a dream.

name: 蒼葉
message: "Ouch..."
What the hell was that?

name: 男性客Ｂ
message: "Ahh... He's so amazing..."
Everyone is staring at his face on the screens. Where before there was raucous cheering, now the crowd seems entranced.
On the screen, Sei blinks slowly.
What...
What the hell is happening?

name: 東江
message: "Thank you. I know Sei appreciates your warm welcome."

name: 東江
message: "I think I would like the entire island, not just Platinum Jail, to enjoy the main event tomorrow. On that note..."
